korean: 매일 반복적으로 하던 작업을 자동화하는 스크립트를 짰다.
데이터 정리하는 거 매일 하는데 진짜 귀찮았거든.
처음엔 어려웠지만 인터넷 검색하면서 하나씩 해결했다.
처음엔 믿기지 않아서 몇 번 더 돌려봤는데 진짜 빨라.
한 명은 자기 업무에도 적용해보고 싶다고 하더라.
이런 작은 개선이 쌓이면 효율이 엄청 올라가겠지.
다음에 또 반복 작업 있으면 자동화해봐야겠어.
english: I wrote a script to automate a task I'd been doing repeatedly every day.
I had to organize data every day and it was honestly so annoying.
It was tough at first, but I figured it out step by step with some googling.
I used Stack Overflow and referenced some GitHub code.
When I tested it, something that took 5 minutes was done in 10 seconds.
I couldn't believe it at first, so I ran it a few more times, but it's seriously that fast.
I shared it with my coworkers and they loved it. Feels great.
One person said they wanna try applying it to their work too.
My team leader praised me for it, which felt really good.
If these small improvements add up, the efficiency gains would be huge.
Next time I have a repetitive task, I should automate it.
It feels good knowing my coding studies paid off.
